msg.msgText: A call writeUTF() on a BytesMessage failed because the input string is too long. The maximum length is 65535 bytes.

msgExplanation.p: The input string for a call to writeUTF() on a BytesMessage must not exceed 65535 bytes when converted to UTF-8.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the input string does not exceed 65535 bytes when converted to UTF-8.
